name: Graz'zt
description: Graz'zt, the Dark Prince, Lord of Corruption, is dangerously charming and seductive.  He regularly consorts with succubi, and they are his favored servants.  Graz'zt prefers to win by guile and trickery rather than through direct confrontation.  His primary rivals within the abyss are Demigorgon and Orcus.
